About the Author

Make Me Yours

By [Tia Louise]126-tia louise

[He]307-he ’s [a billionaire single dad who needs help]308-a billionaire single dad who needs help . [She]309-she ’s [a sassy single gal who needs work . Live - in nanny]310-a sassy single gal who needs work . live - in nanny ? What could go wrong ?

[Remington Key]92-ruby : [I]0-i left [the Navy]2-the navy , scored [a billion in tech]311-a billion in tech , got married , and had [a baby]312-a baby . [I]0-i did everything by the book . Happily ever after , right ? Fast - forward four years , and [I]0-i ’m alone , raising [[my]0-i daughter]313-my daughter , caring for [[my]0-i mother - in - law]314-my mother - in - law , and trying to keep [my]0-i stuff together . How did this happen ? [I]0-i was clearly drunk the night [I]0-i offered [a gorgeous girl in [a bar]316-a bar]315-a gorgeous girl in a bar $ 500 a day to be [[my]0-i live - in nanny]317-my live - in nanny . Or maybe it was [my]0-i dick talking . So what if [I]0-i ’ve been alone since forever ? [I]0-i ’m focused on launching [my]0-i new business , not bedding [the sexy siren who sleeps down [the hall]319-the hall]318-the sexy siren who sleeps down the hall . At least that ’s what [I]0-i keep reminding [myself]0-i …

[Ruby Banks]135-ruby : [Remington Key]92-ruby is distant , brooding , and ridiculously sexy . And when [he]320-he scoops up [[his]320-he adorable four - year - old daughter]321-his adorable four - year - old daughter [Lillie]91-lillie and blows raspberries on [her]91-lillie tummy while [she]91-lillie squeals with delight , [my]0-i ovaries literally explode . Bumping into [him]320-he at [[our]322-our local pub]323-our local pub that night slightly drunk and overly frustrated was a total accident . [He]320-he needed help , and it was the Christian thing to help [a man in need]324-a man in need . Right ? Only , [Remington Key]92-ruby does not make [me]0-i feel very Christ - like … No matter how committed [I]0-i am to being [a responsible employee]325-a responsible employee .

( [A small - town STAND - ALONE CONTEMPORARY Romantic Comedy]326-a small - town stand - alone contemporary romantic comedy . No cheating ; No cliffhangers . )

This book is a work of fiction . Names , characters , places , and incidents are products of [the author]327-the author ’s imagination or are used fictitiously . Any resemblance to actual events or locales or [persons , living or dead]328-persons , living or dead , is entirely coincidental .

Prologue

Ruby

Fifth grade

It ’s a truth universally acknowledged that [little girls]370-little girls know by fifth grade whether [they]370-little girls ’re bitches or not . Okay , [I]0-i just made that up based on the intro to [Jane Austen]128-jane austen ’s Pride & Prejudice . [I]0-i do n’t really know if it ’s a universal truth or not , but in [Oakville]7-oakville , [[our]371-our tiny bedroom community of [Charleston]8-charleston]372-our tiny bedroom community of charleston , it was real clear the day [Serena Whitehead]129-serena emerged as [queen bitch of [our]371-our fifth - grade class]373-queen bitch of our fifth - grade class . [A lot of [families]375-families]374-a lot of families had migrated to [Oakville]7-oakville from [Charleston]8-charleston for [the small - town schools]376-the small - town schools and the perception of safety , so [we]371-our were meeting a lot of [new girls]377-new girls . Still , [we]371-our ’d known [Serena]129-serena since Kindergarten … “ [[My]129-serena mother]2370-my mother says [[your]0-i dad]2371-your dad was voted Most Handsome in [high school]2372-high school . ”[129-serena] [Her]129-serena voice comes from behind [my]0-i left shoulder . “ Too bad [you]0-i look nothing like [him]378-my father . ”[129-serena] [She]129-serena ’s right . [[My]0-i father]378-my father , prominent [Charleston neurosurgeon Kenneth Banks]130-kenneth banks , is tall , with light brown hair and flinty blue eyes . Stepping back , [I]0-i smooth [my]0-i finger along the fair brow framing [his]378-my father round eyes , thinking how they look disappointed even in charcoal . “ [[My]0-i mom]2373-my mom was voted most beautiful in [her]2373-my mom graduating class . ”[0-i] “ Where was that ? [Suzy Wong Manicurist Academy]131-suzy wong manicurist academy ? ”[129-serena] [Serena]129-serena laughs , and [I]0-i turn to face [her]129-serena . [Bitches]379-bitches do n’t scare [me]0-i . “ [Clemson Magnet]132-clemson magnet . [Her]129-serena degree was in accounting . ”[379-bitches] [I]0-i leave out how [she]129-serena then met [[my]0-i dad]380-my dad and gave it all up to stay [home]381-home and raise [[her]129-serena family]382-her family , also known as [me]0-i . “ [You]0-i are so good at portraits . ”[0-i] [[My]0-i best friend]383-my best friend [Drew]154-drew ’s voice is a sweet interruption , and the fist in [my]0-i chest relaxes . “ [I]154-drew ’m too literal . ”[154-drew] Leaning [my]0-i shoulder against [hers]129-serena , [I]0-i speak quietly . “ [Your]129-serena technique is good — ”[0-i] “ [They]2374-they just never look like [the person [I]129-serena ’m drawing]2375-the person i ’m drawing . ”[129-serena] [Serena]129-serena is n’t done . “ What [a pair]2376-a pair , ”[129-serena] [she]129-serena quips . “ [The fallen princess]2377-the fallen princess and [the daughter of [a geisha]2379-a geisha]2378-the daughter of a geisha . ”[129-serena] [My]0-i jaw tightens , and [I]0-i turn quickly , stepping right into [her]129-serena face . “ [You]129-serena ’d better watch [your]129-serena mouth , [Serena Whitehead]129-serena . ”[0-i] “ Why , banana brains ? ”[129-serena] [Her]129-serena eyes flash , but [I]0-i do n’t flinch . “ [[My]0-i family]2380-my family are [Bak Mei kung fu masters]2381-bak mei kung fu masters . Since the age of seven , [I]0-i ’ve perfected the Five Finger Heart Exploding technique . ”[0-i] [Serena]129-serena ’s green eyes narrow slightly . “ What the hell is that ? ”[129-serena] “ Piss [me]0-i off , and [I]0-i ’ll show [you]129-serena . ”[0-i] “ [I]134-ms. hughes ’m telling [Ms. Hughes]134-ms. hughes [you]129-serena threatened [me]134-ms. hughes . ”[134-ms. hughes] “ [I]129-serena ’m telling [Ms. Hughes]134-ms. hughes [you]129-serena ’re [a foul - mouthed bully]2382-a foul - mouthed bully . ”[129-serena] [We]384-our glare at [each other]385-each other as the second - hand ticks , one … two … three … Until [[our]384-our teacher]386-our teacher ’s voice breaks the stand - off . “ [Girls]2383-girls , what ’s going on here ? ”[134-ms. hughes] [Ms. Hughes]134-ms. hughes puts [her]134-ms. hughes hand on [my]0-i shoulder , and [Serena]129-serena skanks off to [her]129-serena side of [the classroom]387-the classroom . [Drew]154-drew pipes in . “ Just packing up , [Ms. Hughes]134-ms. hughes . ”[154-drew] [[Our]384-our teacher]386-our teacher gasps , clutching [her]386-our teacher chest . “ Why , [Ruby Banks]135-ruby , this portrait of [[your]135-ruby father]2384-your father is outstanding . It ’s an amazing likeness . [You]135-ruby have to take it [home]381-home and show [him]2384-your father tonight . ”[154-drew] “ Oh , no … ”[386-our teacher] The confidence in [my]0-i chest deflates . “ [[My]154-drew dad]380-my dad ’s not really into art . ”[154-drew] Or anything [I]0-i do … “ Nonsense ! ”[386-our teacher] [She]386-our teacher spins off toward [her]386-our teacher desk . “ [I]386-our teacher ’ll send [them]389-teachers a note . [I]386-our teacher ’m recommending [you]135-ruby for the artistically talented program at [Oakville High]9-oakville high . [You]135-ruby have real potential ! ”[386-our teacher] It ’s no use arguing . [I]0-i ’ve tried explaining to [teachers]389-teachers before , and [they]389-teachers never believe [me]0-i . [Everyone]390-everyone thinks [[my]0-i dad]380-my dad is [some cultured philanthropist]392-some cultured philanthropist because [he]380-my dad grew up in [the city]393-the city and [Charleston]8-charleston General named [[the children]394-the children ’s surgery wing]395-the children ’s surgery wing after [him]380-my dad … Maybe even because [he]380-my dad married [[my]0-i mom]2373-my mom . The truth is , [he]380-my dad ’s kind of just [an absentee jerk]397-an absentee jerk . “ Sure . ”[0-i] [I]0-i smile and nod . When [I]0-i meet [Drew]154-drew ’s eyes , [her]398-her smile is sad . “ [You]0-i should go to the artistically talented program . [You]0-i really deserve it . ”[398-her] “ [We]399-we both know it ’s not going to happen . ”[398-her] The bell rings as [we]399-we finish collecting [our]399-we books . [Serena]129-serena glares at [me]0-i from across [the room]400-the room , but [I]0-i have more important things to worry about . “ [Bak Mei kung fu masters]2381-bak mei kung fu masters ? The Five Finger Heart Exploding technique ? ”[154-drew] [Drew]154-drew whispers , and [we]399-we both start to laugh . “ [I]154-drew guess [somebody]2388-somebody never watched [Kill Bill]136-kill bill . ”[154-drew] “ Or The Amazing World of [Gumball]137-gumball . ”[399-we] [We]399-we do a low five , and [I]0-i follow [her]398-her to the door . “ [Ruby]135-ruby , wait ! ”[134-ms. hughes] [Ms. Hughes]134-ms. hughes hurries to give [me]0-i a business - sized envelope . “ [I]134-ms. hughes want [you]135-ruby to give this to [[your]135-ruby parents]2389-your parents tonight . Have [them]2389-your parents sign it . ”[134-ms. hughes] “ Yes , [ma’am]2390-ma’am . ”[134-ms. hughes] A knot tightens in [my]0-i throat . [I]0-i wish [people]401-people would n’t jump to conclusions . Unless [they]401-people need the exercise . [Drew]154-drew and [I]0-i walk [our]399-we regular route [home]381-home from [school]403-school . 23

by [Tia Louise]126-tia louise

Tabby

About the Author

[Tia Louise]126-tia louise is [the USA Today best - selling , award - winning author of When [We]2357-we Touch]2358-the usa today best - selling , award - winning author of when we touch , the Bright Lights , One to Hold , and Dirty Players series , and [co - author of the # 4 Amazon bestseller [The Last Guy]355-the last guy]2359-co - author of the # 4 amazon bestseller the last guy . After being [a teacher]2361-a teacher , [a book editor]2362-a book editor , [a journalist]2363-a journalist , and finally [a magazine editor]2364-a magazine editor , [she]126-tia louise started writing love stories and never stopped . [Louise]126-tia louise lives in [the Midwest]2365-the midwest with [[her]126-tia louise trophy husband]2366-her trophy husband , [two teenage geniuses]2367-two teenage geniuses , and [one grumpy cat]2368-one grumpy cat .
